Fibonacci sequence in Python¶

Generate a Fibonacci sequence of size n (#. of terms)

Through subscript notation \(F_{n}\) we can define:

\(F_{n = 0} = 0\) and \(F_{n = 1} = 1\)

and the recursive function:

\(F_{n} = F_{n-1} + F_{n-2} \to \{n\in \mathbb{N}, n>1\}\)

Where each subsequent term \(F_{n}\) is produced from the sum of the previous two terms \(F_{n-1}\) and \(F_{n-2}\) in the sequence.

Refer to: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fibonacci_sequence

param n:

number of terms in the sequence

type n:

int

return:

Return a Fibonacci sequence containing the elements up to n

rtype:

tuple

raises:

ValueError → if n < 1
